## Preconditions v1 meta

Group        | Version     | Kind
------------ | ---------- | -----------
meta | v1 | Preconditions



Preconditions must be fulfilled before an operation (update, delete, etc.) is carried out.

Appears In:

</ul></aside>

Field        | Description
------------ | -----------
uid <br /> *string*    | Specifies the target UID.
